Definition: In this task, you are given a context tweet, a question and corresponding answer of given question. Your task is to classify given passage into two categories: (1) "yes" if the given context is useful in answering the question, and (2) "no" if the given context is not useful.
Positive example 1-
input: Context: Our prayers are with the students, educators & families at Independence High School & all the first responders on the scene. #PatriotPride— Doug Ducey (@dougducey) February 12, 2016 Question: at which school were first responders on the scene for? Answer: independence high school
output: yes

input: Context: Working on a new superhero film called Look At Me Man. Gonna be tight, yo. 👍😈😎💪— Shane West (@shanewest_1) May 13, 2014 Question: what superhero film was mentioned? Answer: look at me man
output: yes
